note:
Dekho mujhe jo deedah-e-ibrat-nigaah ho!
Meree(Ghalib's ofcourse) suno jo gosh-e-naseehat-niyosh hai!
Look at me, if you have the admonition-watching eyes, to know what not to be!
Listen to me(him), if you have an advice-listening ear, to know how one must be!
Mostly for the 'taazah vaaridaan-e-bisaat-e-havaa-e-dil', fresh arrivals on the spread(minefield) of the desires(concupiscence) of the heart but, works just as well for life in general.

Mohd. Rafi is ❤️

PP: He/Him
